SimpleDataListSpec.Name: Fiscal Year Simple Data List
SimpleDataListSpec.Description: A simple data list that returns fiscal year records
SimpleDataListSpec.Author: Abel C. Debela

SPSimpleList.c:CreateProcedureSQL: create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SIMPLEDATALIST_FISCALYEAR as select ID as VALUE, YEARID as LABEL from dbo.GLFISCALYEAR order by YEARID
